name: World Academy for Local Government and Democracy
goal: Our vision is to help local governments to understand democracy more deeply; to contribute to the local and regional governments on institutionalizing their democratic participation methods and processes, to contribute them on finding our alternative, functioning methods and instruments for development and establishment of human rights. Our vision is to encourage cooperation, ideas and experience sharing between local and regional governments, and civil society. World Academy for Local Government and Democracy aims to submit a forum under whose roof the theory and implementation are gathered, opinion and experience transference is enabled, democracy and human rights ideals are jointly shared and essential circumstances to create effective local and regional governments are debated and made public.
interests: Communication, Culture, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, External Relations, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: WALD has been following the activities and resolutions of the European Commission. Mainly our focus is on Migration and Home Affairs policy and Cohesion Policy. Concerning the Cohesion Policy, WALD has been pursuing projects on the 9th and 10th priority issues which are "Promoting social inclusion, combating poverty and any discrimination" and "Investing in education, training and lifelong learning". Our foundation is closely interested in facilitating the implementation of Sustainable Development Goals (SDG) in local governments. In this regard, we are also following EU actions concerning SDGs, especially 1st, 4th, 5th, 8th, 9th and 11th goals.
